https://www.bilibili.com/video/av328054906
B站地址：如何轻松快速且有创意地造山 | Minecraft教程
视频中所用的命令行：execute as @a[gamemode=creative,nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:feather"},Inventory:[{Slot:0b,id:"minecraft:feather"}]}] at @s positioned ^ ^ ^10 run clone xyz uvw ~-3 ~-2 ~-3 masked normal复制代码
